description.value: Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to resist Psychic Powers that affect their mind. Psychic powers that have physical effects are unaffected by this talent.

system.benefit: Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to resist Psychic Powers that affect their mind. Psychic powers that have physical effects are unaffected by this talent.

specialAbilities.name: Reroll vs Mind-Affecting Powers
specialAbilities.description: You can reroll failed Willpower tests to resist psychic powers that affect your mind. Psychic powers with physical effects are unaffected.
